Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Stauette of a cat
Description: A small bronze cat, sitting upright, which is very well modelled, the facial and whisker detail is very delicate. The eyes were inlaid with gold, some traces of which still remain. The cat wears a collar from which hangs an udjat-eye, carefully incised and detailed.
